name: 123 PPV Software
short_description:
You can sell videos online now and offer pay per minute or pay per view service.
123 PPV software can provide live or HD live quality videos. The performer can play offline video/image/MP3 recurrently. Meanwhile the performer can take screenshot of his/her video to be the room logo, to attract users.
Admin can define the membership levels of the paying users by his own: names, name styles, required credits to upgrade, and privileges, etc.
Admin can define Achievement Level either for the chat users or for the performers. Each level has a special icon and name.
123 PPV Software recently introduces some plugins to enhance the chat: marquee messages, Facebook fan, Facebook like, Twitter, games, YouTube. Admin can enable or disable these plugins fr
Viewers may switch between PPV rooms easily to watch different shows.
The multi-threaded Java server works like clockwork with high-load support, ensuring unprecedented performance with any number of users.
summary: A web-based video chat software for websites sell online videos.
